messages.title: Dear Resident
messages.content: We are now only a few weeks away from one of the most critical elections in our lifetime.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Few of the Lib Dems wanted to go into a coalition nationally with the Conservative Party. However, because we were brave enough to do this, we were able to help provide the stability the country needed to get us through the financial crisis.
Our few Liberal Democrat MPs have managed to prevent the Conservatives making life even more difficult for the poorest in our community.

Over 75% of our 2010 manifesto has been achieved - things like pupil premium, free school meals, decent guaranteed pension rises, the increased personal tax allowance - all were Liberal Democrat policies.
Passionate about keeping the NHS working efficiently, and welcomes the Lib Dem commitment to put in an extra £8 billion by 2020 which will help provide the services we need.

issues.health: Passionate about keeping the NHS working efficiently, and welcomes the Lib Dem commitment to put in an extra £8 billion by 2020 which will help provide the services we need.
issues.socialWelfare: Our few Liberal Democrat MPs have managed to prevent the Conservatives making life even more difficult for the poorest in our community.

housing.content: He would work hard to support better infrastructure to give residents improved roads, and work with the local Health Trusts

politicalExperience.achievements: Works full-time as a management accountant in the NHS.

contactInformation.address: Flat 1, 39 Sinah Lane, HAYLING ISLAND PO11 OHJ
